description.name: usdtbep20
description.tagline: USDT bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-usdt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDT bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/usdt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/usdt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
